import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Col, Label, Row } from 'reactstrap' import axios from 'axios'; const productApiURL = process.env.REACT_APP_PRODUCT_API_URL; const Catalog = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ headers: [], rows: [] }); const getData = async () => { await axios.get(`${productApiURL}`) .then(({data}) => { setData(data) }) .catch(err => alert(err)) } useEffect(() => { getData() }, []) return (
CATALOG {data.rows.map((row, idx) => (

{["red", "green", "blue"].map((v, idx) => ( ))}
)) }
) } export default Catalog
